title: 2010학년도 봄학기 생활관 신청／배정(안내)
content: 2010학년도 봄학기 생활관 신청/배정 안내 A notice for admission into University housing for Spring semester 2010 2010학년도 봄학기 생활관 배정을 첨부와 같이 안내하오니 안내문을 주의깊게 읽어보시고 생활관 입사와 관련하여 불이익을 받는 일이 없도록 하시기 바랍니다. We give you the information on the admission into University housing for the Spring semester 2010 as attached. We'd like you to refer to this notice carefully, so you won't be disadvantaged for admission into the dormitories. 생활관 홈페이지의 신청창은 신청기간에만 open합니다. Application Window on the Dormitory Web opens during the application period only. Application period : 10AM, Dec. 7. 2009(Monday) ~ 6PM, Dec. 9. 2009(wed) 2009. 11. 25. Dean of Student Affairs
